title: Courts of Honor
description: Star Trek Fan FictionHonor and duty collide when Starfleet orders the Enterprise to ignore the human tragedy on a planet near the Romulan border for political reasons.(This a classic work of fan fiction, a space opera set in the Star Trek universe. Kirk/Spock slash, adult only.)http://ksarchive.com/viewstory.php?si...Cover by Sat Nam Kaur KeaheyWord count: 307,852 complete
author: Syn Ferguson
